thread.title: Severe thunderstorm watch for the Waikato
thread.title_full: Severe thunderstorm watch for the Waikato

title: Severe thunderstorm watch for the Waikato
text:
Severe thunderstorm watch for the Waikato Last updated 15:30, February 8 2017 /FAIRFAX NZ. 
The weather watch is in place until 10pm. 
Heavy showers and wind are expected in the Waikato on Wednesday evening. 
A severe thunderstorm watch has been issued for the region, with warnings of flash floods, especially in low-lying areas of streams, rivers or narrow valleys, which may also lead to slips. 
Wind is also expected in the afternoon and evening as well as a few isolated downpours. Driving conditions will be hazardous with surface flooding and poor visibility in heavy rain.
